definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="664" type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><comment h="67" pinned="false" w="226">This tests if the output slot has less than 64 items in it if it's true than it will run the rest of the conditions.</comment><value name="A"><block type="block_inv_get_amount_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">64</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment h="68" pinned="false" w="148">All of these procedure blocks test for items in the crafting grid slots.</comment><value name="A"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.APPLE</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:FrigidBits</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">OR</field><comment h="68" pinned="false" w="179">This tests if there is an item in the crafting grid or if there is an empty slot.</comment><value name="A"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><comment h="86" pinned="false" w="405">This tests if the item is the same as what is being crafted and if the stack amount is equal to or less than 63. Subtract the number of items you are placing in the slot from 64, and you will get the value you need to set amount to.</comment><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LTE</field><value name="A"><block type="block_inv_get_amount_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">63</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CandyIce</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcitems"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="151">This needs to be set to an air block.</comment><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_inv_remove_items"><comment h="68" pinned="false" w="222">These procedure blocks remove one item from all crafting grid slots except for the output slot.</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_inv_remove_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="block_inv_set_items"><comment h="69" pinned="false" w="351">This gets the number from the output slot then adds the amount to the output slot. This item should be the crafted item. Note that +1 is the amount you are crafting.</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="block_inv_get_amount_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CandyIce</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
